title: Married life (TEFC)
brief_description: Part One of the series “The Family of Man”’ which sets out to compare family life in five different locations around the world. In a comparison of marriages, with men and women sometimes having several partners, this program sets out to discover what, if anything, these marriages have in common. Husbands and wives, shown going about their daily lives are interviewed.
